services.title: Our Services
services.website: We create stylish, mobile-friendly websites tailored for individuals and businesses. Custom design options are available based on your needs.
services.events: We create special celebration websites for birthdays, weddings, and more—featuring photos and heartfelt messages to make memories last.
services.procurement: We assist you in selecting and purchasing the right PCs and IT devices. Perfect for beginners seeking reliable guidance.
services.osSupport: We provide reliable support for installing and updating Windows or other operating systems, including restoring older PCs.
services.deviceSelection: We help you choose and purchase IT devices like iPhones and Androids, offering clear guidance even for beginners.
services.consulting: We offer IT consulting tailored to your needs—helping individuals and businesses optimize their digital environments.

ceoMessage.title: CEO Message
ceoMessage.message1: We provide optimal IT solutions tailored to each customer's individual needs.
ceoMessage.message2: If you are interested in high-quality, low-cost systems provided by an elementary school student CEO, please feel free to contact us.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.note: Prices are flexible and negotiable with customers (discounts possible, may also increase depending on requirements)

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.method: Work requests and inquiries are accepted via email

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.content: As this is operated by an elementary school student CEO, responses may be delayed on weekdays due to school commitments.

sourire.title: Restaurant Sourire
sourire.description: We focused on multilingual support to convey the charm of this Michelin one-star restaurant to international customers.

maeda.title: Maeda-san Drinking App
maeda.description: We created entertainment for drinking parties where the next order is decided by roulette.

hachi.title: Hachi Dental Clinic Gacha App
hachi.description: We scattered mechanisms to make people want to visit Hachi Dental Clinic again.

companyVision.title: The Meaning Behind Our Company Name "Wapeta"
companyVision.subtitle: The Spirit of Wapeta

founder.title: The Founder's Vision
founder.content: The "Wa" in Wapeta comes from the initials of our founder, Wataru Shiraishi, who has gained attention as the "Elementary School Student CEO of the Reiwa Era".

technology.title: The Power of Technology
technology.content: The "peta" comes from "petabyte", a unit representing vast amounts of information in the digital world.

vision.title: Vision for the Future
vision.content: Combining these two elements, "Wapeta" symbolizes our vision of the future: "One child possessing overwhelming amounts of information and possibilities to move the world".

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We aim to become an entity that creates petabyte-level value in the world of education, IT, and AI, starting from small steps. We challenge uncharted territories and build a society where the next generation of children can shape their dreams together with technology. Wapeta leads this charge.
